name: 无极群侠传
description:
Anticipate the enemy, see the move, lock the weakness, and win with a single blow! Use your wits to defeat the strongest enemy!



Match dozens of blades, trinkets and moves to define your own fighting style!



It's not an action game, but it strives to present exciting fights that get the blood pumping!



A whole bunch of martial arts masters are waiting for you to fight! Each with a very different origin and unique fighting style, learn their weaknesses and ultimately defeat them to experience an unparalleled sense of accomplishment!



Where there are people, there are rivers and lakes, dig into everyone's story and feel the flesh and blood of the rivers and lakes!
